user_query: My company is organizing a gaming tournament and we want to include League of Legends as one of the games. Can you provide us with the list of teams and players participating in the league? Additionally, find out if there are any interesting facts about League of Legends that we can share with the participants.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of teams participating in the League of Legends league.
Retrieve the list of players for each team from the previous step.
Search for interesting facts and trivia about League of Legends.
